counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavier nightly reading, more frequent analytical essays, vocabulary.

notes_and_context: Prepares students for AP English. Expect a faster pace and more in-depth analysis than Academic.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Standard PE activity, plus written assignments, health projects, and tests.

notes_and_context: The Honors distinction comes from the written project work, not from increased physical difficulty.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily problem sets, faster pace, more abstract problems.

notes_and_context: The foundational honors math course. Success here is a strong indicator for the upper-level math track.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily problem sets, faster pace, covers geometry and advanced algebra.

notes_and_context: Faster-paced math sequence. Covers concepts in more depth to prepare for Math 3.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily problem sets, fast pace, complex function analysis.

notes_and_context: A challenging course that bridges algebra and pre-calculus. A key 'gateway' to AP Calculus.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily problem sets, advanced function analysis, intro to calculus concepts.

notes_and_context: A follow-up to Math 3 for students who want a rigorous math class but may not be ready for AP Calculus.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Lab reports, projects, reading assignments.

notes_and_context: A good introductory honors science. Faster paced than Academic with more project-based work.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Regular homework, lab write-ups, unit tests, some memorization.

notes_and_context: A challenging but standard honors science. This is the direct prerequisite for AP Biology.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy problem sets, frequent labs, memorization of formulas.

notes_and_context: A very rigorous, math-based science. This is the direct 'gateway' course for AP Chemistry.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Case studies, project-based labs, analytical writing.

notes_and_context: A high-interest elective. Honors requires more in-depth analysis and writing.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Intense memorization of terms, diagrams, and systems; lab work.

notes_and_context: A 'detail-hard' class. Success is almost purely based on your ability to memorize a huge volume of terms.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Problem sets (physics-based), projects, night sky observations.

notes_and_context: A physics-light course. More conceptual and math-based than many expect.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy reading, thematic analysis, document analysis (DBQs).

notes_and_context: The direct 'gateway' course for AP World History. Focuses on document analysis.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Nightly reading, document analysis, timed-writes.

notes_and_context: This is the direct 'gateway' course for AP US History. The 'jump' from this to APUSH is very large.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Current events analysis, reading of legal documents, projects.

notes_and_context: This is the 'gateway' course for AP US Government. Focuses on the structure of US government.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Reading-heavy, discussion-based, analytical essays.

notes_and_context: A high-interest elective. Focuses on social structures and group behavior. Less memorization than Psychology.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Reading case law, debates, analytical essays.

notes_and_context: A great course for aspiring Pre-Law students. Very reading and debate-heavy.

course_name: Lessons of Vietnam War/Recent International Relations (Honors)

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy reading, primary source analysis, research papers.

notes_and_context: A deep-dive history elective. Expect a heavy reading and writing load.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Project-based, requires creative thinking, time-intensive projects.

notes_and_context: Learn Adobe suite (Illustrator, Photoshop). Difficulty is based on project complexity, not tests.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Project-based, requires creative thinking, time-intensive video projects.

notes_and_context: Learn Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects. Difficulty is based on project quality and time management.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Hands-on labs, memorization of breeds/anatomy, project work.

notes_and_context: A great hands-on elective for students interested in Vet Med or Agriculture.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: More advanced labs, heavy memorization, management projects.

notes_and_context: Builds on Animal Science I with more depth in biology and business.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Hands-on labs (greenhouse), plant identification, projects.

notes_and_context: A hands-on class. Honors involves more in-depth projects and research.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Business management projects, advanced greenhouse work.

notes_and_context: Builds on Horticulture I with a focus on business and advanced plant science.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Problem sets, data analysis projects, learning functions.

notes_and_context: Extremely practical skill. Difficulty is logic-based, not memorization. Leads to official certification.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Project-based, design-focused.

notes_and_context: Goes well beyond basic use. Leads to official certification.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Coding projects, logic puzzles, debugging.

notes_and_context: A great introduction to text-based coding. This is the 'gateway' to AP Computer Science.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: More complex coding projects, algorithms, data structures.

notes_and_context: Builds directly on Python I. A must-take for aspiring CompSci majors.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Project-based, business plan creation, group work.

notes_and_context: A 'big-idea' class. Success is based on your project work and creativity, not tests.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Running a real or simulated business, advanced projects.

notes_and_context: Puts the Entrepreneurship I plan into action. Very project-based.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Cooking labs, nutritional analysis projects, research.

notes_and_context: Builds on Food & Nutrition I. Honors involves more science and research.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy memorization of medical terms, basic anatomy, projects.

notes_and_context: The first step in the Health Science pathway. Lots of vocabulary.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: More advanced medical terms, patient care skills, case studies.

notes_and_context: The 'gateway' to the Nursing and Biomedical programs.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Lab-based, data analysis, research projects.

notes_and_context: A rigorous, lab-focused course for students interested in medical research.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Project-based (CAD, 3D printing), problem-solving challenges.

notes_and_context: A great hands-on class for aspiring engineers. More rigorous than the Academic version.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily practice, after-school rehearsals, performances, theory assignments.

notes_and_context: Level 3 band. Honors requires additional assignments and a higher level of performance.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily practice, after-school rehearsals, leadership, advanced theory.

notes_and_context: Level 4 (highest) band. This is the top ensemble, requiring a significant time commitment.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily practice, after-school rehearsals, sight-reading, theory assignments.

notes_and_context: Level 3 chorus. Honors requires additional assignments and a higher level of performance.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily practice, after-school rehearsals, leadership, advanced theory.

notes_and_context: Level 4 (highest) chorus. This is the top ensemble, requiring a significant time commitment.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily practice, after-school rehearsals, choreography projects.

notes_and_context: Level 3 dance. Honors requires choreography and written analysis.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Daily practice, after-school rehearsals, leadership, advanced choreography.

notes_and_context: Level 4 (highest) dance. This is the top ensemble, requiring a significant time commitment.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Monologue/scene work, after-school rehearsals, script analysis.

notes_and_context: Level 3 theatre. Honors requires script analysis and directing projects.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Advanced scene work, directing, after-school rehearsals, leadership.

notes_and_context: Level 4 (highest) theatre. This is the top ensemble, requiring a significant time commitment.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Hands-on projects, after-school build sessions, design projects.

notes_and_context: Level 3 tech theatre. Honors requires design-level projects (e.g., lighting, sound design).

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Hands-on projects, after-school leadership, stage management.

notes_and_context: Level 4 (highest) tech theatre. Involves leadership roles in school productions.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Time-intensive projects, portfolio development.

notes_and_context: Level 3 visual arts. The 'gateway' to AP Art. Focuses on developing a body of work.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Time-intensive projects, portfolio development, artist statements.

notes_and_context: Level 4 (highest) visual arts. For students building a college admissions portfolio.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Time-intensive painting projects, portfolio development.

notes_and_context: A specialization of Level 3 art. Focuses on painting.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Time-intensive 3D projects, portfolio development.

notes_and_context: A specialization of Level 3 art. Focuses on 3D work.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Frequent writing assignments, reading, workshop critiques.

notes_and_context: A workshop-based class. Great for students who enjoy writing fiction and poetry.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Running school media (e.g., announcements), video production, strict deadlines.

notes_and_context: A high-responsibility, project-based class with real-world deadlines.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Design, writing, photography, sales, strict deadlines.

notes_and_context: A high-responsibility, project-based class with real-world deadlines.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Leadership roles (Editor), design, writing, photography, strict deadlines.

notes_and_context: This is for the leadership/editor roles in Yearbook. Very high responsibility.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Writing speeches, public speaking, research.

notes_and_context: Difficulty is based on your comfort with public speaking, not a heavy workload.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy translation, grammar drills, reading classical texts.

notes_and_context: This is the 'gateway' to AP Latin. Focus shifts from grammar to reading real Latin literature.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy translation of advanced texts (e.g., Virgil), literary analysis.

notes_and_context: A very rigorous course for students on the AP Latin track.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Speaking, listening, and writing in French; complex grammar.

notes_and_context: This is the 'gateway' to AP French. Class is conducted mostly in French.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Advanced conversation, reading literature, analytical essays.

notes_and_context: A very rigorous course for students on the AP French track.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Speaking, listening, and writing in Spanish; complex grammar.

notes_and_context: This is the 'gateway' to AP Spanish. Class is conducted mostly in Spanish.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Advanced conversation, reading literature, analytical essays.

notes_and_context: A very rigorous course for students on the AP Spanish track.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavier nightly reading, more frequent analytical essays, vocabulary.

notes_and_context: The 'gateway' course for AP English Language. Focuses on world literature and analytical writing.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy reading (American Lit), analytical essays, research papers.

notes_and_context: The non-AP version of AP English Language. Focuses on American Literature.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Heavy reading (British/World Lit), analytical essays, research papers.

notes_and_context: The non-AP version of AP English Literature. Focuses on British and World Literature.

counselor_profile.workload_profile: Projects, budgeting assignments, stock market analysis.

notes_and_context: A practical, required course. Honors involves more in-depth projects and analysis.
